org.typemeta.funcj.codec

Interface Codec<T,E>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the raw type to be encoded/decoded
    E - the encoded type
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Codec.NullCodec<E>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Codec.BooleanCodec, Codec.ByteCodec, Codec.CharCodec, Codec.DoubleCodec, Codec.FloatCodec, Codec.IntCodec, Codec.LongCodec, Codec.ShortCodec, Codecs.ClassCodec, Codecs.CodecBase, Codecs.StringProxyCodec, JsonCodecs.OptionalCodec, JsonMapCodecs.MapCodec, JsonMapCodecs.StringMapCodec, XmlCodecs.OptionalCodec, XmlMapCodecs.MapCodec, XmlMapCodecs.StringMapCodec

    public interface Codec<T,E>
    Interface for classes that encapsulates the logic for encoding a value of type T into a value of type E and vice versa.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Codec.BooleanCodec<E>
      Codec for Boolean and boolean values.
      static class  Codec.ByteCodec<E>
      Codec for Byte and byte values.
      static class  Codec.CharCodec<E>
      Codec for Character and char values.
      static class  Codec.DoubleCodec<E>
      Codec for Double and double values.
      static class  Codec.FloatCodec<E>
      Codec for Float and float values.
      static class  Codec.IntCodec<E>
      Codec for Integer and int values.
      static class  Codec.LongCodec<E>
      Codec for Long and long values.
      static interface  Codec.NullCodec<E>
      Codec for null values.
      static class  Codec.ShortCodec<E>
      Codec for Short and short values.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default T decode(Class<T> dynType, E enc)
      Decode a value of type E back into a value of type T.
      default T decode(E enc)
      Decode an encoded value of type E back into a value of type T.
      E encode(T val, E enc)
      Encode a value of type T into and encoded value of type E.

    • Method Detail

      • encode

        E encode(T val,
         E enc)
        Encode a value of type T into and encoded value of type E.
        Parameters:
        val - the unencoded value
        enc - the encoded parent value
        Returns:
        the encoded value

      • decode

        default T decode(Class<T> dynType,
                 E enc)
        Decode a value of type E back into a value of type T. One of the two decode methods must be implemented by sub-classes.
        Parameters:
        dynType - the dynamic type to decode into.
        enc - the encoded value
        Returns:
        the decoded value

      • decode

        default T decode(E enc)
        Decode an encoded value of type E back into a value of type T. One of the two decode methods must be implemented by sub-classes.
        Parameters:
        enc - the encoded value
        Returns:
        the decoded value
